WRITING.TITLE: When an internet freak meets real life

WRITING.TEXT: Do I count as a racist if my peen is blackish?

WRITING.TITLE: How could I convince a friend to stop dating a pedo?
WRITING.TEXT:
So, here's the fuss. We are already 20 and we live in different cities, we only talk by Facebook and Skype. So, I stopped talking to her for the past year when she revealed she was very close to her boyfriend after a brief fight we had.
She started gloating about telling him about everything that happened on her day, that included talking about me and other friends.
I was already with another girl and she knew it, and I knew she was with another guy, but we decided to not talk about them.
Her telling me that she talked about everything with him had some nasty implications, I wouldn't want to know that our personal conversations are being shared, so I blocked her.
For the past months I decided to investigate her boyfriend and holy fuck. Basically, he was a dude into his 25's who started dating her while she was 15.
She doesn't have a father and has to take care of her brothers so I've concluded she has daddy issues and would look up to someone much older than her.
I've decided to talk to her again and confirmed it. Her real life friends stopped talking to her whenever they got to know about him and her mother never agreed but she couldn't do much to stop him.
So this girl stopped telling people about her boyfriend, and because of it, on these 5 fucking years, nobody has really helped her telling her "what the hell are you doing".
I pretty much told her that but since it was our very first conversation, I didn't manage to go very deep into her mind. She only said she was thinking about it, but since then hasn't done anything, she still likes his memes and keeps talking to him by inbox.
Anything I should know to convince her that even if she is legal now, it was AND is a pretty fucked up thing to be with an old man? Dude's not even rich or handsome, while she is pretty easy on the eye and a has a lot of good things.
He pretty much told her she was too mature for her age and gave her the attention she wanted, but you've got to have some REALLY LOW moral to even get attracted to a little girl. I'm 20 and see 15 yrs old girls as little sisters, that dude was 25 goddammit.
You know, I don't even know if I'm requesting help, but I needed to say that. Still, if you want to say anything, I'll read it. She has everything going for her and is only making some loser happy.
I like how impersonation an Englishman or an Eastern European is cool, but as soon as you fake an Ebonics accent you're labeled a raycis.

WRITING.TITLE: Some math for LR Goku, may be off since I'm panicking
WRITING.TEXT:
Just for LR Goku, not taking into account the TUR farm. To get 777 medals...
We'd need to WIN 111 times. At 50 stamina that'd be 2 times in the morning (unless you have 150 but that's uncommon) then waiting to refill till' night. Say, 8 times each weekend. 111/8=13.875.... 13 weekends is the minimum of time (without refilling) to get LR Goku.
Assuming everything just goes as planned and you get to always play and win. And you'd need to do it again to max him.
Even though he is "Free", you need to go full whale to get him while he's still relevant. Playing without refilling will take at least 4 months and by then he won't be the strongest.
Don't despair tho, it will still help to one day get him to link with new LRs, Gogeta has been out for 6 months already and people without him would still be glad to suddenly get him.
But yeah this isn't free at all unless you're planning on playing long-term, you'll eventually farm him. If his stage gave at least current Super stages with x3 XP it would be good.
Pls tell me we get at least 20 medals per fight
